creditline: Gift of Arthur and Lucille Weiss
description: Composite Effigy Tripod Bowl, ceramic, Costa Rican (Nicoya Peninsula), 300-800AD cat. card dims H 3-1/4 x D 6' with slightly rounded base, basal flange and outflaring upper section; tripod effigy supports are hollow, with 3 rattle holes each, in the form of jaguar heads; curvilinear black, red, and cream polychrome decoration; brown ceramic
title: Composite Effigy Tripod Bowl
